claim: Recombinant technology leads to a broader immune response that may provide cross-protection, even in a mismatch season.
explanation: Left side shows a table of contents listing sections and page numbers; right side shows text describing CDC adoption of ACIP recommendations and publication details, including suggested citation, editorial staff, and board members. The image contains only table of contents and administrative/publication text about CDC and ACIP recommendations and does not include any data or statements about recombinant technology, immune responses, or cross-protection in mismatch seasons, so it does not support the claim Note: The image quality is sufficient to confirm no relevant clinical or immunological data are present
